description: Fixed intro sweep timing, tried to add harmony throughout the solo
title: Fermented Offal Discharge (Solo)

description:
I had two small revisions after watching this vid, feel free to investigate: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_UlBWOFUYyo

The intro sweep:
- Note his hand position isn't in a triangular 17-16-17 position but instead naturally at a straight line. I think he picks the top note twice giving the effect of more notes in the sweep than they are.

Sweep after the break at 3:45: 
- Note his fingers are definitely at 9 and 13 on the top string, and I think this sweep is correct.
title: Fermented Offal Discharge (Solo)
